key_risks: Regulatory and compliance issues, including NYSE non-compliance and HFCAA listing
Legal challenges, including investor lawsuits and data privacy concerns
Dependence on third-party platforms like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant
Intense competition in the IoT industry
controversies: NYSE non-compliance notice due to low trading price of ADSs
Lawsuits alleging misleading statements related to IPO
Data privacy concerns and cybersecurity scrutiny
social_issues: Data privacy concerns and potential misuse of user data
governance_issues: Regulatory non-compliance and potential delisting risks

sources.title: Tuya's IOT products may be a high security risk
sources.snippet: Tuya falls under a new Chinese law that requires company to turn over any and all collected when the government request it. And Tuya has been collecting a lot of personal information from their devices. This raises both privacy and security concerns. There are currently proposals in congress limiting the expansion of Tuya in the U. S. marketplace.
